column1: Before having a melt down, please consider doing the following:Check your own country’s consulate, government or foreign office web sites for their advice on countries/areas affected by the virus.Check the latest information from the health authorities of the country you are visiting.Do not pay too much attention to people who are intent on turning a crisis into a drama. You are an adult, do your research and make your decision accordingly.

Answer to your questionNOGREEN YELLOWORANGERED It’s DORSCON ORANGE - it’s in control but spreading . Come here - you won’t be as carefree as you would be if you chose an uninflected holiday place RED means out of control - that’s when to panic. RUN!Imo - About 25% risk at each level.
